name: Sam & Max: MAX Pack
description:
Get two seasons of MAX mayhem: Beyond Time & Space and The Devil's Playhouse!

Join gaming's greatest dog and rabbit sleuths for 10 episodes of nonstop chaos. Wield psychic powers and everyday household items to take on Santa, a Eurotrash vampire, intergalactic space gorillas and the Devil himself!

* Designed & written with Steve Purcell, creator of the Sam & Max comic series.
* 10 episodes with self-contained plots, each bringing you closer to solving season-wide crises.
* Innovative built-in hint system that detects when you're stuck.



Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
